name: Touchula
description:
Free for a limited time only!!

Touchula is a unique, fast and challenging matching game with colorful experiences

Your goal is to survive as long as you can. Sounds easy right? Well think before every drag!

Features

- Fast paced 3X3 matching
- Simple 9 "gymnasts" on map
- Increasing colors
- Clean interfaces of simplicity
- Compete for the higest hula score with players all over the world
- Localization Supported
